text: Sadhana Shivdasani (2 September 1941 - 25 December 2015), better known as Sadhana, was an Indian actress. She was known for her roles in Woh Kaun Thi? (1964), Mera Saaya (1966) and Anita (1967). Shivdasani was born in Karachi, Sindh, British India (now Pakistan). She died in Mumbai from cancer at the age of 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in India Category:Indian movie actors Category:Actors from Karachi Category:People of British India Category:Indian stage actors
title: Sadhana Shivdasani
